name: cell (itch)
description:
HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED!

cell is a generative audiovisual experiment for macOS 10.8+

cell and it's engine were built from scratch using Cinder and SuperCollider, originally for an undergraduate final-year project in 2013.

cell is an experiment, and is in continual development. Expect more creatures, sounds, tweaks, and surprises coming soon!

Hopefully there will be a Windows version in the near future.
